name: Echofang
description: A streamlined curved dagger with glowing blue edges, displayed on a cracked altar, surrounded by shadow effects and soft ethereal glow. Forged for dual-wielding assassins, each strike hides another voice.
description_ch: 一把帶有發光藍色邊緣的流線型弧形匕首，它被陳列在一座破裂的祭壇上，周圍有著陰影效果和柔和的空靈光芒。專為雙刀刺客所鑄，每一擊都藏著另一個聲音。
